channel.title: Code-Quality on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Code-Quality on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: GitHub Code Quality: Organization-level dashboard in public preview
item.description:
GitHub Code Quality added an organization-level dashboard in public preview to view code health across repositories with Code Quality enabled.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub Code Quality in public preview
item.description:
GitHub Code Quality is now available in public preview, bringing in‑context findings, one‑click Copilot fixes, and reliability and maintainability scores directly into pull requests to help improve code during review.

  • Source: GitHub
